main.name: Alexis Manduke
main.bio: My creative spark started with a pencil to paper. I have an educational and professional background in art and design. Now I use my creativity to decorate the web with code!
main.contactmessage: Think we could work well together? Let's get in touch

resume.skillmessage: These are the skills I've been working on!

education.description: Majored in Communications Design with a focus in Advertising and Illustration

Studied web development languages: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, progressive web apps, agile methodology, computer science, database theory, MongoDB, MySQL, Git, and more.

testimonials.text: Alexis is very patient and kind. She will get the job done and make sure it's what you want!
I really enjoyed working with Alexis for my new logo. She did a great job.
